description: This 20-inch monitor gives you crisp, sharp imagery at an affordable price. Perfect for all of your home computing needs, the HP S2031 monitor includes VGA and DVI-D connectivity so you can easily connect to your PC or notebook, and plug-and-play gets you up and running quickly. It also features tilt adjustment for a comfortable view.
title: HP S2031 20-Inch Diagonal LCD Monitor - Black
